column4: Would someone walk me through setting my smb.conf so that my windows machine can view my samba share? Right now I'm getting permission errors
I'm trying to see the wondows network through linux.
well... viewing my windows network through windows works fine for me
have you tried going to smb:///
I just need to view it through linux, not vice versa.
right, browse to smb:/// and see if you can see it there
smb:/// gives me a black page saying index of smb:/// then nothing else
no luck, just gave me a text file to donwload
How can I setup samba to share my printers? I finally got shares themselves working, but how do I share my printer?
how can I enable the admin web interface in CUPS?
no idea what to do then?
